name: matching-service
description: Spotback backend matching, tracking, and notification service

scripts.start: export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=./service-account-file.json && export CONF_ENC_UNLOCK=xSO8P5MMSIlUQTIGeuHwtUK7 && es4x run --conf $(node src/decrypt.js) --redeploy "src/**" --on-redeploy "npm run start" src/lib/server.js

author: Dylan Corbus
